rules_text:
Flying, trample
Telethia, the Endbringer’s power is equal to the total number of creature cards and land cards in all graveyards.
Sacrifice a creature or land: Draw a card.
When Telethia, the Endbringer is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner’s library.
notes: 2.2.1: Changed the sacrifice to draw you a card and gave this a reshuffle effect just for itself. At least now if you’re playing golgari self mill against the mechon, you can force them to wait for you to draw this.
